conbody.p: Accounts also include resources, which are entities or objects with which users interact. These can include other instances, volumes, buckets, images, IP addresses, availability zones, key pairs, snapshots, and vmtypes.

Resources have friendly names as well as Eucalyptus resource names (ERNs). Friendly names can generally be used as command-line arguments, whereas ERNs must be used when creating access control policies.
